summary: A small modification to Eola the cannibal and follower of the Daedric Prince Namira.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i641.photobucket.com/albums/uu140/edg3k/2012-06-11_00002.jpg?t=1339426278[/img][/center]

[center][size=18pt][b]Eola The Cannibal Companion[/b][/size][/center]

One of my favorite and longest used companions is Eola. She has some amazing abilities and is very very strong, but I always found her lacking in personality. So I decided to tweak her a little. Ive given her a new warpaint, increased her max level to 80 and hopefully fixed her not participating in combat issue.

Spells :

Alteration : Oakflesh - Stoneflesh

Destruction : Chain Lightning - Fireball - Firebolt - Incinerate - Lightning Bolt - Thunderbolt
	
Conjuration : Conjure Flame Atronach - Raise Zombie - Reanimate Corpse

Restoration : Close Wounds - Fast Healing - Steadfast Ward 

---Mods Used---

Younger Bretons
XCE Characters Enhancement Complete
Natural Eyes
author: Edg3
